name: FuncAmerica
tag_list: crowdfunding, crowdsourcing, investor, investment, startup, start-up, funding, 506d, jobs-act, title-ii, title-iii, business-financing
overview: FundAmerica, formerly Arctic Island, is a game-changing innovator in equity and debt crowdfunding and small business finance. The Company is committed to funding small businesses and creating American jobs. FundAmerica’s service connects businesses with prospective investors on a transparent technology platform that leverages new laws on business capitalization via private placements of securities. For more information including partner opportunities, please visit www.fundamerica.com.
